name: JOHAN(prototype)
description:
Johan our protagonist is a psychopath, what will he become in this world full of zombies? I bet you already know what's he's going to do, that's right you get to play as Johan.

--CONTROLS--

Arrow keys and WASD - Movement
Space - jumping / drop off ladder

Shoot -  Left click on the Mouse

Up / W - climb ladders

T - Drop Weapon

Ctrl + F1 - Fullscreen Mode

'R' to restart (only works when you're dead)

-31 Bullets at disposal.

-Head shots are more effective.

IMPORTANT : Plaything the game in your browser exists a lot of problems that are inherent to each individual browsers. Unless you use a mac, I recommend downloading the .exe file on to your desktop as it is only 1-2 megabyte.
